text: Flatland is a 2019 South African drama film directed by Jenna Bass. It was screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2019 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Faith Baloyi as Capt. Beauty Cuba * Nicole Fortuin as Natalie Jonkers * Izel Bezuidenhout as Poppie ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 films Category:2019 drama films Category:South African films Category:South African drama films Category:Afrikaans-language films
title: Flatland (2019 film)
